This word emphasizes the broader societal issue of limited access to sufficient and healthy food for all individuals.', "Underfed child - This phrase conveys the idea that a child's dietary needs are not being met, which can have serious consequences for their physical and mental development.", 'Unfulfilled appetite - This phrase acknowledges that hunger is not just a physical sensation but also an emotional one, as people may feel unsatisfied or unfulfilled even after consuming food.', "Empty pantry - This phrase emphasizes the lack of available food in someone's home or community.", 'Lean and gaunt (due to lack of food) -
